typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		activityid as string,
		directioncode as boolean,
		statuscode as integer,
		subject as string,
		scheduledend as timestamp,
		regardingobjectid as string,
		actualdurationminutes as integer,
		ownerid as string,
		prioritycode as integer,
		modifiedon as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> DataverseParquet
source(output(
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_activityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		regardingid as string,
		duration as integer,
		direction as boolean,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> STG
DataverseParquet derive(RAWHASH = crc32(512,toString(ownerid),toString(statuscode),toString(scheduledend),toString(prioritycode))) ~> CrearHASH
CrearHASH, STG lookup(upper(activityid) == BK_activityid,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
Lookup1 split(isNull(HASHKEY),
	HASHKEY != RAWHASH,
	disjoint: false) ~> Split@(Nuevos, Actualizaciones, Nada)
Split@Nuevos alterRow(insertIf(true())) ~> Insertar
Split@Actualizaciones alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> Actualizar
Insertar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_activityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		regardingid as string,
		duration as integer,
		direction as boolean,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		activitytype,
		HASHKEY = RAWHASH,
		BK_activityid = activityid,
		ownerid = Split@Nuevos@ownerid,
		regardingid = regardingobjectid,
		duration,
		direction,
		modifiedon = Split@Nuevos@modifiedon,
		priority,
		status,
		duedate
	)) ~> Nuevos
Actualizar sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		activitytype as integer,
		HASHKEY as long,
		BK_activityid as string,
		ownerid as string,
		regardingid as string,
		duration as integer,
		direction as boolean,
		modifiedon as timestamp,
		priority as integer,
		status as integer,
		duedate as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['BK_activityid'],
	skipKeyWrites:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		activitytype,
		HASHKEY = RAWHASH,
		BK_activityid,
		ownerid = Split@Actualizaciones@ownerid,
		regardingid = regardingobjectid,
		duration,
		direction,
		modifiedon = Split@Actualizaciones@modifiedon,
		priority,
		status,
		duedate
	)) ~> Actualizaciones
